thread.title: Bea Campbell defends Tom Watson on Westminster sex abuse claims
thread.title_full: Bea Campbell defends Tom Watson on Westminster sex abuse claims - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Bea Campbell defends Tom Watson on Westminster sex abuse claims
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Bea Campbell defends Tom Watson on Westminster sex abuse claims 16 October 2015 Last updated at 11:31 BST
Bea Campbell defends Tom Watson's actions to highlight sex abuse claims naming high profile figures in Westminster.
She said the "hounds were howling” over his accusations, and that some were trying to silence the Labour deputy leader for defying the Establishment.
In a personal film for This Week, she said: "You and I don’t know what went on around Westminster, we weren't there. But the rage against Zac Goldsmith and Tom Watson for trying to find out is as unseemly as it is routine and predictable."
Watch the lively studio debate that followed
Read more This Week's Guests: 2015 Tom Watson refuses to apologise over Lord Brittan abuse claims Abuse inquiry accidentally deletes victim submissions
